title: JAMES MCBRIDE IN RESIDENCE: THE HEAVEN & EARTH GOSPEL (SPONSORED)
description: James McBride is joined by a collective of musicians and singers for a captivating evening of gospel, bringing to glorious musical life the characters and key moments from his critically acclaimed novel, The Heaven & Earth Grocery Store. Use code SKINT10 for $10 off full price tickets.
address: Symphony Space, 2537 Broadway & 95th Street, NY, NY 10025
